sentences.en: Families hunker down indoors hanging illuminated orange paper stars in their darkened windows.
sentences.cn: 家族里的猎人们在屋里休养生息,从昏暗的窗户中能看到星星点点的橘色烛光.

sentences.en: I have to hunker down to finish my algebra this evening.
sentences.cn: 我今晚要专专心心地把代数作业做完.

sentences.en: It's an instinct to hunker down and control things that makes this harder for people.
sentences.cn: 其实着手控制是一种本能,结果却把事情变得更加困难.

sentences.en: The youngsters hunker down at the bottom of the nest, hiding until mom mealtimes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们通常藏在巢穴底部, 等到母亲呼唤时才出来.

sentences.en: Their strategy for the moment is to hunker down and let the fuss die down.
sentences.cn: 他们目前的策略是保持低调，让事态慢慢平息。

sentences.en: They are not allowed to hunker down to rest after running 5,000 meters.
sentences.cn: 他们跑完5000米后不准蹲下休息.

sentences.en: Work hard, hunker down, tighten your belt, and a better life.
sentences.cn: 努力工作 、 盘腿坐下 、 勒紧腰带 、 和改善生活.
